Name: La Bicyclette
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A light and fragrant Sweet Martini style drink with elderflower liqueur and peach bitters.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2008 by Jamie Boudreau, Seattle, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of La Bicyclette contains 174 calories
